PacketSender

Class SystemSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • PacketSender.SystemSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SystemSender
extends java.lang.Thread
    This Class uses as thread that create a request to the server for the relevant data and also wait for arrived data from the server if needed
